text: Adek anɨb ak, chɨn gos kɨles gɨl nɨŋɨd, kanɨb God kɨdek gɨnɨmɨb agak ak yɨpɨd gɨl nep amnɨgun. Binɨb God nop gos lɨnɨgɨlak agosɨpun anɨb okok, kuŋay yɨbɨl chɨnop puŋɨl kuskus gɨl, wɨsɨp yu gup tek jak mɨdɨl nɨg mɨdebal. Anɨb ak tek tap gos awl nɨŋɨd koslam amnɨgabun okok kelɨgɨl, tap si tap tɨmel chɨnop kasek chɨgɨnɨmuŋ tek lup ak kelɨgɨl, kanɨb tep yomebal anɨb ak amnɨgun.
